QueryResult.text: SELECT i.id investment_id,t.prid parent_task_id,t.prid child_task_id FROM inv_investments i JOIN prtask t ON i.id = t.prprojectid UNION ALL select i.id investment_id,parent.prid parent_task_id,child.prid child_task_id from inv_investments i JOIN prtask parent on i.id = parent.prprojectid JOIN prtask child on parent.prprojectid=child.prprojectid WHERE parent.PRWBSSEQUENCE < child.prwbssequence AND parent.WBS_NNBSEQ > child.prwbssequence
